Commands.Stellar Circle 5: 3-hit melee BRV attackHigh turn rateSelf: 3 turns MAX BRV Up ILow chance 3 turns SPD Down I to target, 3 turns SPD Up I to self
Commands.Free Energy: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV  1.2 + HP attackHigh turn rateFair chance 3 turns DEF Down I to target, 3 turns DEF Up I to self
Commands.Booster 8: 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attackSelf: 6 turns MAX BRV Up V

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.BRV Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Mighty Stellar Circle 5: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Stellar Circle 5 by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Free Energy: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Free Energy.

Passives.Wolf Killer: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Wolf-type targets.
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Stellar Circle 5.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.First Strike: Moderately raises Attack at the start of each battle.
Passives.Free Energy Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Free Energy.
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Charge: Increases the max uses of Stellar Circle 5 by 1.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Free Energy Charge: Increases the max uses of Free Energy by 1.
Passives.Gentle Knight: Slightly raises Attack based on the number of female allies in the party.
Passives.Ability Attack Bonus: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack, HP Attack
Passives.Stellar Circle 5 Extension: Stellar Circle 5 use +2When using Stellar Circle 5: Moderate damage boost Moderate SPD Down hit rate boost Slight SPD Down boost Slight SPD Up boost Moderate MAX BRV Up boost
Passives.BRV Initiative: Moderately raises SPD while BRV is at least 50% of MAX
Passives.Free Energy Extension: Free Energy use +2When using Free Energy: Slight BRV increase based on ATK Slight DEF Down hit rate boost Slight DEF Down boost Slight DEF Up boost 3 turns ATK Up II

Weapons.Butterfly Sword: Increases Free Energy's BRV multiplier to 1.5.Raises the success rate of Small Defense Down.Extends Small Defense Up and Small Defense Down's durations to 5 turns.
Weapons.Zwill Crossblade: Increases Stellar Circle 5's potency and raises the success rate of Small Speed Down and Small Speed Up.Also extends Small Speed Up's duration.
Weapons.Exploda: May equip the EX Ability Booster 8.
Weapons.Verdant Slasher: Slightly raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack for 3 turns after inflicting a debuff.
